readable.title: 272988646_1588bde6a8
readable.content: A girl with a blue Mohawk is walking . A woman with a blue Mohawk holds a child 's hand while waiting to cross the street . A woman with a blue Mohawk holding the hand of a little boy with a green striped shirt on a street corner . A woman with a blue Mohawk is walking with a small child . A young woman with a blue Mohawk looks to the right while holding a toddler 's hand who is looking to the left .
